its a sav game file.  you would put it on your ttds.  make a copy of your current save game file and then overlay it with this one.

You will need 2 DS to do the trades.  You would trade pokemon from this SAV to your SAV.

You can trade them to legit retail cart as well.
rename this save file to whatever your save file is named.  or rename your rom to whatever this save file is named so they both match.

Yes it works just fine. Just rename the SAV file the same as the NDS file.
For example: 
Pokemon HG.nds
Pokemon HG.sav
That's it

Steps to make it this awesome file to work on Desmume 0.9.7 :
1] Open a HG/SS rom. 
2] Go to 'File' and click on 'Import Backup Memory' and then select THIS {Pokemon HeartGold SoulSilver Full Starter Pokemon} file (this file name and the rom name should be same...like HG.nds and HG.sav.)
3] Then go to 'Emulation' and click 'Reset'.
4] Then let the rom load and click on Continue from main menu with the player name as Jason...
